name: Kramped Kingdoms
description:
MADE FOR THE UNREAL MEGAJAM 2021.

KRAMPED KINGDOMS

Kramped Kingdom is a strategy game where you have to balance resources, buildings and available space.. Travel through four biomes trying to create a castle that is worthy of a king.

Inspired by the inventory management in Resident Evil 4.

I hope you enjoy this game as much as i did making it. Please excuse any bugs or wonkiness.

Controls

WASD - Move the camera around.

Q and E - Rotate the camera

Mouse Wheel - Zoom in and out.

Mouse Buttons - Left click to select, Right click to deselect.

Esc - Display Menu.

Assets

All assets were crudely created by myself apart from the following.

Some awesome game icons from https://game-icons.net/

Music loop from https://www.gamedevmarket.net/asset/music-loops-mini-set/
